name: Time Traveling Game
description:
Time Traveling Game

A 2D platformer about time traveling. More will be reveled in the future. 

In this 2D platformer inspired by games like Rayman and Sonic the Hedgehog, you can jump (duh), wall jump, stomp, slide, punch, air kick, while collecting mysterious orbs and fighting Time Shadows as you make your way through eras of time. 

This game was part of my school Capstone project. 

Due to my deadline, I wasn't able to put in everything I planned, though I expected that. This is just a short demo of a larger project, which I plan to finish. Things like the title and story are still in progress. This is my first game.

Music, artwork, and programming by Matthew Quock (ddwefresh). 

Font "Silver" by Poppy Works, Wolfgang Wozniak.

Thanks to Shaun Spalding and YouTube for the great tutorials.

Music, artwork, and characters belong to Matthew Quock (ddwefresh).
